scene_description_enriched: The image depicts the Virgin Mary, crowned and with a halo, holding the Christ Child on her lap. She wears a golden dress and a blue mantle. The Christ Child, also with a halo, is dressed in a golden tunic and holds a small red orb, possibly representing the world or an apple. The background is a rich red tapestry adorned with gold floral motifs. The scene is framed by an arched border with gold and red decorative elements.
